wikipedia_page.main: Ernest Wool Lewis (5 April 1867 – 19 April 1930) was a British amateur lawn tennis player who was active at the end of the 19th century.

response: The half-volley came to prominence in the hands of George Caridia and Ernest Lewis in the early 1900s.The Times, Borora's Record,  23 Oct. 1935
